document.full_text: spain will give companies three months to put their workers fully on the books or face fines under a new bill aimed at eradicating a black market that accounts for up to 20 percent of the economy.
document.title: spain cracks down on black market jobs
lines_and_colors: spain will give companies three months to put their workers fully on the books or face fines under a new bill aimed at eradicating a black market that accounts for up to 20 percent of the economy.
